reviews.review: Our entire family LOVED Frozen II, and thats saying something since my oldest daughter is anti-princess anything! Great songs, great storyline, A+!
Certainly not as good as the first movie.  The storyline was good and Olaf without a doubt made the movie worth watching.

Much better than the first one, Olaf was funnier in this one!! I love that Kristof got an awesome song with Sven as back up!!! Love the message that sisters concur all!! Songs were amazing, love the lizard, love that Elsa didnt get a relationship, focused more on Elsas powers!! There needs to be a third one about Anna and Kristofs wedding and Elsa in the forest!!

Just ok. Not my favorite kids movie, but enjoyed it as an adult. This was my 3yos first movie at the theaters and I was disappointed at how infrequently she laughed!! Not anything like the first movie, in my opinion. More deep moments, real-life moments that I think are better geared toward teens and adults than the young crowd. 

Also, the Kristoff song, while hilarious, I felt did not fit AT. ALL! Could have used a more authentic way of Kristoff opening up than an 80s/90s tribute-style song. A weird addition, I thought.
reviews.displayName: Great music and life lessons, meh for kids.

user.displayName: Great music and life lessons, meh for kids.

reviews.review:
Creators have yet another beautiful animation script woven around an intricate storyline, that captures various emotions&mood as well as keeping audience enchanted with wonderful graphics... BGM and songs were all in cohesion & a big strength to the movie. I felt movies such as CoCo & Rango were class apart, this movie is to become one among such classic. 
watched it yesterday night and the still the haunting Voice - the call, keeps resonating in my ears...

Beautiful cinematography. A bit scary for small children.
Was not as predictable as the first movie. Overall loved the plot and was a good movie for all ages.
Loved It!!!! Everyone Should See It!!!
Horrible service. We waited for 20 minutes to get popcorn. Then, once seated  I had to go back to the front to get the 3D glasses where I received an attitude from the security.
